text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: Narita Airport… If I ever go to the "Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe" race in France, this is the airport I'll be leaving from.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: Hehe, I guess it wouldn't hurt to start imagining and getting a feel for what it'll be like, huh?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: I'll make sure to arrive at the airport with plenty of time to spare and make all necessary arrangements… to ensure that I'll have a smooth and stress-free journey――

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: Oh, I almost forgot - I should do a quick check of all my things before I leave. I definitely don't want to forget anything important, do I?
